response.final_text:
I don’t have a tool called "nonexistent_tool." Available tools I can use right now are:
- get_current_time — return the current date/time
- calculator — evaluate math expressions
- request_approval — ask a human for approval before a sensitive action
- multi_tool_use.parallel — run multiple of the above tools in parallel

Tell me what you want to accomplish and I’ll pick the right tool. Examples:
- “What time is it?” (I’ll use get_current_time)
- “Calculate 12345 * 6789” (I’ll use calculator)
- “Ask for approval to delete dataset X” (I’ll use request_approval)
- “Run time and 2+2 in parallel” (I’ll use multi_tool_use.parallel)

Which would you like me to do?
